hero.title: AM2I — Moroccan Association for Artificial Intelligence and Innovation
hero.subtitle: A scientific non-profit dedicated to advancing AI research, innovation, and capacity building in Morocco and internationally. We support high-quality scientific events, promote research dissemination, and encourage collaboration between academia, industry, and public institutions.

mission.heading: AM2I Aims To
mission.subheading: Building a stronger AI ecosystem through research, collaboration, and innovation
goals: Promote excellence in AI research and innovation
Support international conferences, workshops, and training activities
Encourage high-quality publications and responsible research practices
Foster impactful AI applications for society and sustainable development
mission.principlesSubheading: The values that guide our work and partnerships
principles: Excellence in research with scientific integrity and reproducibility standards
Responsible AI development with focus on ethical and sustainable applications
International collaboration fostering knowledge exchange between institutions
Community engagement and capacity building for the next generation of AI researchers

about.heading: About AM2I
about.intro: The Moroccan Association for Artificial Intelligence and Innovation (AM2I) is a scientific association committed to building a strong AI ecosystem through research promotion, knowledge transfer, and international collaboration.
keyMissions: Support researchers, PhD students, and innovators in AI and data science
Encourage partnerships between Moroccan and international institutions
Promote responsible AI, scientific integrity, and reproducibility
Contribute to training and awareness through seminars and events
Provide a sustainable platform for AI innovation and research dissemination
about.cardText: AM2I actively supports initiatives such as IANLP 2026, contributing to the development of international scientific exchange in AI and Natural Language Processing.
about.initiativeName: IANLP 2026 — International Conference on AI & NLP
about.commitmentText: We believe that AI innovation should be accessible, ethical, and beneficial to society. AM2I creates spaces where researchers, academics, students, and professionals can collaborate, share knowledge, and develop solutions that address real-world challenges while maintaining the highest standards of scientific integrity.

activities.heading: AM2I Activities
activities.subheading: Comprehensive programs designed to advance AI research and innovation

items.title: Conferences & Workshops
items.description: International events in AI, NLP, and data science

items.title: Training Sessions
items.description: Capacity building for students and professionals

membership.heading: AM2I Membership
membership.subheading: AM2I welcomes researchers, academics, students, and professionals interested in Artificial Intelligence and innovation.
benefits: Access to AM2I scientific events and networking opportunities
Visibility through AM2I-supported activities and initiatives
Participation in scientific committees and community actions
membership.ctaNote: More details about membership fees and application process will be available soon.

contact.heading: Contact AM2I
contact.subheading: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to us through any of these channels.
